author: lmartin
msg: added some info for the 1.4.1 release

author: lmartin
msg: Moved particle derivation checking for complexTypes to the end of TraverseSchema.   This is required to propertly handle references to toplevel elements and substitution groups

author: lmartin
msg: Don't process top-level element declaration references at the time of referral.    This causes problems with tricky circular definitions.

author: elena
msg: Added 2 new properties to Xerces parser to allow to specify schemas externaly.
